p: To a stirred solution of alcohol 17 (200 mg, 0.51 mmol) in MeCN (5 mL) were added DIPEA (178 μL, 1.0 mmol) and 2-chloro-4 H-benzo[d][1,3,2]dioxaphosphinine (192 mg, 0.51 mmol) at 0 °C. After stirring for 1 h at 0 °C, H 2O 2 (250 μL, 30% in H 2O) was added at 0 °C. After stirring for 1 h at 0 °C, the resulting mixture was directly purified by silica gel column chromatography to afford phosphoester 18 (220 mg, 76%) as a colorless oil. 18: Pale yellow oil; R f 0.7 (CHCl 3/MeOH = 8/1); [α] D 21 −7.85 ( c 0.53, CHCl3); 1H-NMR (600 MHz, CDCl 3), δ in ppm major-isomer 8.19 (s, 1H), 7.78 (s, 1H), 7.32–7.24 (4H, overlapped), 7.12–7.09 (m, 1H), 6.99–6.94 (2H, overlapped), 6.90–6.86 (2H, overlapped), 6.34–6.31 (1H, overlapped), 5.60 (2H, brs), 5.26–5.14 (2H, overlapped), 4.72–4.67 (2H, overlapped), 4.58 (d, J = 11.6 Hz, 1H), 4.52–4.49 (m, 1H), 4.37–4.34 (m, 1H), 3.80 (s, 3H), 2.89–2.85 (1H, overlapped), 2.67 (s, 1H), 2.66–2.61 (1H, overlapped); minor-isomer 8.26 (s, 1H), 7.80 (s, 1H), 7.32–7.24 (4H, overlapped), 7.09–7.06 (m, 1H), 6.99–6.94 (2H, overlapped), 6.90–6.86 (2H, overlapped), 6.34–6.31 (1H, overlapped), 5.62 (2H, brs), 5.26–5.14 (2H, overlapped), 4.72–4.67 (2H, overlapped), 4.62 (d, J = 11.6 Hz, 1H), 4.47–4.44 (m, 1H), 4.41–4.38 (m, 1H), 3.81 (s, 3H), 2.89–2.85 (1H, overlapped), 2.67 (s, 1H), 2.66–2.61 (1H, overlapped); IR ν max (film) 3175, 2114, 1643, 1597, 1513, 1458 cm −1; HRMS (ESI) m/ z = calcd 586.1462 [M + Na] +, found 586.1467 [M + Na] +.
